meanings.definition: Attracting attention in a vulgar manner
meanings.sent1: The meretriciousness decorations at the party were loud and flashy.
meanings.sent2: Her meretriciousness outfit was covered in sequins and glitter.
meanings.sent3: The meretriciousness display of neon lights clashed with the elegant theme of the event.
meanings.sent4: The salesman's meretriciousness pitch was full of empty promises and exaggerated claims.
meanings.sent5: The meretriciousness advertisement used bright colors and bold fonts to grab attention.

meanings.definition: Superficially attractive but lacking real value
meanings.sent1: The meretriciousness jewelry looked shiny but turned out to be fake.
meanings.sent2: His meretriciousness compliments were insincere and meant to manipulate.
meanings.sent3: The meretriciousness facade of the building hid its crumbling structure underneath.
meanings.sent4: The politician's meretriciousness promises were quickly forgotten once elected.
meanings.sent5: The meretriciousness charm of the salesman faded once his true intentions were revealed.
